name: Balloon Battle (Dhaman Mehta)
description:
Play as a water balloon and fight others by shooting water at them to either pop or deflate them. Be careful, your shots also cost water and will make you shrink in size. Find puddles of water to refill your water supply. When you turn blue, it mean you are close to death. 

This game's controls are designed with a Keyboard and Mouse for Player 1 and an Xbox controller for Player 2.

Controls

Keyboard (Player 1)

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Spacebar - Jump

Left Click - Bigger Enemy Bullets

Right Click - Smaller Enemy Bullets

Xbox Controller (Player 2)

Left Stick- Move

Right Stick - Aim

A - Jump

Right Trigger - Bigger Enemy Bullets

Left Trigger - Smaller Enemy Bullets

Prototype made by:

Dhaman Mehta - Producer

Elizabeth Ross - Artist

Liz Ivey - Technical Artist

Sumi Nakamura - Engineer

Rohan Patel - Engineer
